metadata.title: CVE-2023-36325 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: i2p before 2.3.0 (Java) allows de-anonymizing the public IPv4 and IPv6addresses of i2p hidden services (aka eepsites) via a correlation attackacross the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses that occurs when a tunneled, replayedmessage has a behavior discrepancy (it may be dropped, or may result in aWrong Destination response). An attack would take days to complete.

criterions.comment: i2p package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
